# Order and hearing details 
Warning: you must comply with this order: otherwise, your case might be struck out or some other sanction might be imposed. If you cannot comply you must make an application to the court before any deadline expires.

## There is judgment for the claimant for an amount to be decided by the court 
Subject to a deduction of:

## Allocation 
The claim is allocated to the Fast track.

## Alternative dispute resolution 
At all stages the parties must consider settling this claim by any means of Alternative Dispute Resolution (including round table conferences, early neutral evaluation, mediation and arbitration); any party not engaging in any such means proposed by another must serve a witness statement giving reasons within 21 days of receipt of that proposal. That witness statement must not be shown to the trial judge until questions of costs arise).

## Variation of directions 
Variation of directions The parties may, by written agreement, extend time for compliance with a direction where that is permitted by CPR 3.8(4). Otherwise, the time for compliance with a direction may only be extended by making an application.

## Settlement 
Each party must inform the Court immediately if the case is settled whether or not it is then possible to file a draft consent order to give effect to their agreement.
